wikipedia_page.main: David Robert Harvey  (born 7 December 1936 in Bromley, died 10 April 2010) was a British paediatrician and considered by his peers to be a champion of the less privileged. Harvey was most notable for developing the training of neonatal medicine doctors at a time when the speciality had no official recognition. Harvey was homosexual and never afraid to disclose it, even at the beginning of his career, when homophobia was more prominent.

response: David Harvey (born 1935) is a geographer and social theorist.
David Harvey may also refer to:
*David Harvey (footballer) (born 1948), former goalkeeper for Leeds United and Scotland
*David Harvey (jurist), New Zealand judge and legal writer
*David Harvey (producer), American music producer who won the 1975 Grammy Award for Best Classical Album
*David Harvey (rugby union) (born 1982), Australian rugby union player
